manager-config.description: 新增broker时，添加默认的用户，用户组，用户和用户组关系，用户组权限数据库脚本
manager-config.property:
INSERT INTO TD_SM_LOG( LOG_ID,LOG_OPERUSER,OP_ORGID,OPER_MODULE,LOG_VISITORIAL,LOG_OPERTIME,LOG_CONTENT,REMARK1,OPER_TYPE)
values(?,?,?,?,?,${date},?,?,?)

properties.name: roleManagerImpl_copyResOfRole
properties.property: insert into td_sm_roleresop(op_id,res_id,res_name,restype_id,types,role_id) select b.op_id,b.res_id,b.res_name,b.restype_id,b.types,? from td_sm_roleresop b where b.role_id =? and (b.op_id,b.res_id,b.res_name,b.restype_id,b.types,?) not in( select c.op_id,c.res_id,c.res_name,c.restype_id,c.types,c.role_id from td_sm_roleresop c where c.role_id=?)

insert into td_sm_roleresop(op_id,res_id,res_name,restype_id,types,role_id) select b.op_id,b.res_id,b.res_name,b.restype_id,b.types,? from td_sm_roleresop b where b.role_id =? and (b.op_id,b.res_id,b.res_name,b.restype_id,b.types,?) not in( select c.op_id,c.res_id,c.res_name,c.restype_id,c.types,c.role_id from td_sm_roleresop c where c.role_id=?)

properties.name: roleManagerImpl_grantRoleresop
properties.property: select count(OP_ID) from td_sm_roleresop where OP_ID=? and RES_ID=? and ROLE_ID=? and TYPES=? and RESTYPE_ID=?
select count(OP_ID) from td_sm_roleresop where OP_ID=? and RES_ID=? and ROLE_ID=? and TYPES=? and RESTYPE_ID=?

manager-config.property: select count(OP_ID) from td_sm_roleresop where OP_ID=? and RES_ID=? and ROLE_ID=? and TYPES=? and RESTYPE_ID=?
insert into td_sm_roleresop(OP_ID,RES_ID,ROLE_ID,RESTYPE_ID,RES_NAME,TYPES) values(?,?,?,?,?,?)

properties.name: purviewmanagerimpl_batchSaveRoleListRoleresop
properties.property: select count(OP_ID) from td_sm_roleresop where op_id=? and res_id=? and role_id=? and restype_id=? and types=?
select count(OP_ID) from td_sm_roleresop where op_id=? and res_id=? and role_id=? and restype_id=? and types=?

properties.name: FunctionDB_getUserorgjobinfos
properties.property: select distinct * from ( select t.org_id,t.remark5,t.org_sn from td_sm_organization t inner join td_sm_userjoborg c on t.org_id= c.org_id inner join td_sm_user b on b.user_id = c.user_id where b.user_id =? order by t.org_tree_level) a

select distinct * from ( select t.org_id,t.remark5,t.org_sn from td_sm_organization t inner join td_sm_userjoborg c on t.org_id= c.org_id inner join td_sm_user b on b.user_id = c.user_id where b.user_id =? order by t.org_tree_level) a

properties.name: FunctionDB_getUserjobinfos
properties.property: select t.job_name from td_sm_job t inner join td_sm_userjoborg c on t.job_id = c.job_id where c.user_id = ? and c.org_id = ? group by t.job_name
select t.job_name from td_sm_job t inner join td_sm_userjoborg c on t.job_id = c.job_id where c.user_id = ? and c.org_id = ? group by t.job_name

manager-config.property: select * from (select o.org_tree_level, o.org_id, o.parent_id, o.org_name, o.orgnumber, o.creator, o.org_sn, o.orgdesc, o.remark5, o.remark3, u.user_name, u.user_realname from TD_SM_ORGANIZATION o left join td_sm_user u on u.user_id = o.creator) o where 1=1 ${where_condition} order by o.org_tree_level
select count(ORG_ID) from TD_SM_ORGUSER where USER_ID =?
insert into TD_SM_ORGUSER(USER_ID, ORG_ID) values(?,?)
select * from td_sm_orgmanager t where t.user_id = ? and t.org_id in ( select o.org_id from td_sm_organization o where o.org_id=? )
select count(1) from td_sm_orgjob where org_id=? and job_id=?
insert into td_sm_orgjob (org_id, job_id, job_sn) values (?,?,?)
select count(user_id) from td_sm_orgmanager e where e.user_id=? and e.org_id=?
insert into td_sm_orgmanager values(?,?)
select count(user_id) from td_sm_userrole e where e.user_id=? and e.role_id=3
insert into td_sm_userrole(user_id,role_id,RESOP_ORIGIN_USERID) values(?,3,?)
select count(user_id) from td_sm_userrole e where e.user_id=? and e.role_id=4
insert into td_sm_userrole(user_id,role_id,RESOP_ORIGIN_USERID) values(?,4,?)
select count(op_id) totalsize from td_sm_roleresop where op_id=? and res_id=? and role_id=? and restype_id=? and types=?
insert into td_sm_roleresop(OP_ID,RES_ID,ROLE_ID,RESTYPE_ID,RES_NAME,TYPES) values(?,?,?,?,?,?)
insert into td_sm_userjoborg (user_id,job_id,org_id,JOB_SN,SAME_JOB_USER_SN,JOB_STARTTIME,JOB_FETTLE) values(?,1,?,999,?,${date},1)
select count(role_id ) from td_sm_userrole where user_id =? and role_id =?
insert into td_sm_userrole(user_id,role_id) values(?,?)
select t.*, us.org_id, org.org_sn from td_sm_user t, td_sm_userjoborg us, td_sm_organization org where us.user_id=t.user_id and org.org_id=us.org_id

select bb.same_job_user_sn, t.*, a.org_id, a.org_sn from (select org_sn, a.org_id from td_sm_organization a where a.org_id in (select t.org_id from td_sm_organization t where t.org_tree_level like concat('0', '%')) order by a.org_sn asc) a,
(select min(tmp.same_job_user_sn) as same_job_user_sn, tmp.org_id, tmp.user_id from ((select ujo.* from td_sm_userjoborg ujo, TD_SM_ORGUSER ou where ou.org_id = ujo.org_id and ou.user_id = ujo.user_id)) tmp group by tmp.user_id, tmp.org_id) bb, td_sm_user t where a.org_id = bb.org_id
select count(1) from TD_SM_USERJOBORG where USER_ID=? and JOB_ID=? and ORG_ID=?
insert into TD_SM_USERJOBORG(USER_ID,JOB_ID,ORG_ID,SAME_JOB_USER_SN,JOB_SN,JOB_STARTTIME,JOB_FETTLE) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,1)
select count(1) from td_sm_userrole where user_id=? and role_id=?
insert into td_sm_userrole(user_id,role_id,resop_origin_userid) values(?,?,?)

property.name: logManagerImpl_backupLog_insert
property.description:
INSERT INTO TD_SM_LOG_HIS SELECT * FROM TD_SM_LOG t where to_char(t.log_opertime,'yyyy-mm-dd') <= to_char(sysdate() - ?,'yyyy-mm-dd')
INSERT INTO TD_SM_LOGDETAIL_HIS SELECT * FROM TD_SM_LOGDETAIL where log_id in ( select log_id from TD_SM_LOG t where to_char(t.log_opertime,'yyyy-mm-dd') <= to_char(sysdate() - ?,'yyyy-mm-dd'))

list.property: INSERT INTO TD_SM_LOGDETAIL_HIS SELECT * FROM TD_SM_LOGDETAIL where log_id in ( select log_id from TD_SM_LOG where ${log_opertime} <= ${starttime})

property.name: logManagerImpl_backupLog_delete
property.description:
DELETE FROM TD_SM_LOGDETAIL where log_id in (select log_id from TD_SM_LOG t where to_char(t.log_opertime,'yyyy-mm-dd') <= to_char(sysdate() - ?,'yyyy-mm-dd'))
DELETE FROM TD_SM_LOG t where to_char(t.log_opertime,'yyyy-mm-dd') <= to_char(sysdate() - ?,'yyyy-mm-dd');

list.property: DELETE FROM TD_SM_LOGDETAIL where log_id in (select log_id from TD_SM_LOG where ${log_opertime} <= ${starttime})

manager-config.property: select role_id from td_sm_roleresop c where types='user' and not exists (select user_id from td_sm_user where user_id = c.role_id)
select a.role_id from td_sm_roleresop a where types='role' and not exists (select b.role_id from td_sm_role b where a.role_id=b.role_id )
select a.role_id from td_sm_roleresop a where types='organization' and not exists (select b.org_id from td_sm_organization b where a.role_id=b.org_id )
insert into mq_permissions(RES_NAME,RESOURCE_TYPE,RES_OP,GROUP_TYPE,GROUP_NAME,AUTHOR,AUTH_DATE,BROKER_ID) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,${date},?)
select count(OP_ID) from td_sm_roleresop where op_id=? and res_id=? and role_id=? and restype_id=? and types=?
insert into td_sm_roleresop(OP_ID,RES_ID,ROLE_ID,RESTYPE_ID,RES_NAME,TYPES) values(?,?,?,?,?,?)
select count(OP_ID) from td_sm_roleresop where OP_ID=? and RES_ID=? and ROLE_ID=? and TYPES=? and RESTYPE_ID=? and auto='1'
insert into td_sm_roleresop(OP_ID,RES_ID,ROLE_ID,RESTYPE_ID,RES_NAME,TYPES,AUTO) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,'1')
delete from td_sm_roleresop where OP_ID=? and RES_ID=? and ROLE_ID=? and TYPES=? and RESTYPE_ID=? and AUTO='1'
select count(OP_ID) from td_sm_roleresop where OP_ID=? and RES_ID=? and ROLE_ID=? and TYPES=? and RESTYPE_ID=? and auto='1'
insert into td_sm_roleresop(OP_ID,RES_ID,ROLE_ID,RESTYPE_ID,RES_NAME,TYPES,auto) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,'1')
